name: HeartGame
description:
Your life's wasting away Doctor Cat! Get to the end before your Hearts drain away. Or you shoot yourself to death, that's also possible.

There is no sound and bugs galore, but I hope you have fun with this one-minute game. This game was made for the Game Makers Toolkit GameJam, with the theme being Only One. In this game, it's Only One resource.

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrows to move

Left Mouse Button to aim and shoot

R to restart
